name: The Su5i Digital Classics Collection
description:
To commemorate Su5i Digital's 3rd birthday, we're releasing all of our old games in a neat little collection. 

All of these games have been remastered in our new, proprietary OCTA Engine to work in widescreen, and to appear as smooth as they possibly can. 

This collection contains:
- Block Shooter (2019)
- Flying Circle (2020)
- nut.sb3 (2020)
- Not-Scary Maze (2020)
- easy.sb3 (2020)
- It's Literally just Pong (2021)
- Shotland (2021)
- Block Shooter 2 (Never released before!


MINIMAL SPEC REQUIREMENTS :
OS (Windows): Any 64-bit Windows version (Windows 10 and 11 recommended)
OS (macOS): macOS Big Sur (macOS Monterey and Ventura recommended)

Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4210H or AMD equivalent
RAM: 3GB RAM (4GB recommended)
Graphics card: Any GPU since 2012 / Any Intel® Integrated Graphics since 2015
Available storage: 1GB (2GB recommended)
